Posts.Content: Hi I am a bit confused. I am currently waiting on results but been told 'I need to prepare myself'. I have joined the site in the hope to chat to someone after following a link saying for 24 hour chat room style support with other individuals. Reading this thread am I right in thinking that I just have to look for a subject I feel fits and hope someone is still awake? I was kind of hoping to chat.
Posts.Title: Chat Room.???????????
